tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PlayerFriends (
    friendship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player1_id INT,
    player2_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player1_id) REFERENCES Players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (player2_id) REFERENCES Players(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PlayerDistances (
    distance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player1_id INT,
    player2_id INT,
    distance FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player1_id) REFERENCES Players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (player2_id) REFERENCES Players(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PlayerInteractions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player1_id INT,
    player2_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (player1_id) REFERENCES Players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (player2_id) REFERENCES Players(player_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Player (player_id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_name STRING, player_location GEOGRAPHY, player_level INT)
CREATE TABLE Item (item_id INT PRIMARY KEY, item_name STRING, item_type STRING, item_description STRING)
CREATE TABLE DistanceMatrix (from_player_id INT, to_player_id INT, distance FLOAT, PRIMARY KEY (from_player_id, to_player_id))
CREATE TABLE InteractionLog (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, timestamp TIMESTAMP, interaction_type STRING, player_id INT, related_player_id INT)
CREATE TABLE PlayerInventory (player_id INT, item_id INT, quantity INT, PRIMARY KEY (player_id, item_id))
